'''1.21.11 Release Candidate 3''' (known as '''1.21.11-rc3''' in the [[launcher]]) is the third and final [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.11]], released on December 8, 2025.<ref>{{mcnet|minecraft-1-21-11-release-candidate-3|Minecraft 1.21.11 Release Candidate 3|December 8, 2025}}</ref>

A separate [[unobfuscated version]] of 1.21.11 Release Candidate 3 was released, titled '''1.21.11 Release Candidate 3 Unobfuscated''' (or '''1.21.11-rc3_unobfuscated''' when in the launcher). This is an experimental version released in preparation for obfuscation being removed from {{JE}} clients and servers.<ref>{{Mcnet|removing-obfuscation-in-java-edition|Removing obfuscation in Java Edition|October 29, 2025}}</ref>

This is the final release candidate released in 2025.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.21.11-rc3
|;prev
|304790|Transparent item models are rendered incorrectly.
|304797|Zombie nautiluses generated in ocean ruins are not persistent.
|304810|Zombies, skeletons and zombie horses can catch fire from light sources when exposed to the sky in an arid biome.
}}</onlyinclude>
